item.title: Melissa add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "Being powerful is like being a lady. If you have to tell people you are, you aren't." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Frederick the Great
item.description: "Diplomacy without arms is like a concert without a score" -- Frederick the Great

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Robert G. Ingersoll
item.description: "Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment - it is a result." -- Robert G. Ingersoll

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "He can compress the most words into the smallest ideas of any man I ever met." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Melissa add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "If you fell down yesterday, stand up today." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bobby Knight
item.description: "Most people have the will to win, few have the will to prepare to win." -- Bobby Knight

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Leo Buscaglia
item.description: "Each of our acts makes a statement as to our purpose." -- Leo Buscaglia

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Malcolm Forbes
item.description: "ItÊ¹s always worthwhile to make others aware of their worth." -- Malcolm Forbes

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Debbie Ford
item.description: "Remember, all the answers you need are inside of you; you only have to become quiet enough to hear them." -- Debbie Ford

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Szent-Gyorgyi
item.description: "Discovery consists of looking at the same thing as everyone else and thinking something different." -- Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Josh Liebman
item.description: "Nature does not demand that we be perfect. It requires only that we grow." -- Josh Liebman

item.title: Melissa add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go." -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: Melissa add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Siddharta Gautama
item.description: "There isn't enough darkness in all the world to snuff out the light of one little candle." -- Siddharta Gautama

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss
